title: Tesla Gears Up for AI Future with Major xAI Investment
description: Tesla announced a $2 billion investment in xAI, aligning with CEO Elon Musk's focus on artificial intelligence. The company affirmed its production schedule for Cybercab robotaxi and Semi trucks. Despite facing competitive pressure, Tesla maintains strong financial performance, driven by a strategic push into self-driving technology.
content: Tesla is making a bold $2 billion investment in xAI, the artificial intelligence company led by CEO Elon Musk, as it pivots further from its roots as an electric vehicle maker. The strategic move aims to strengthen Tesla's position in the autonomous ... [788 chars]

title: Meta Forecasts Spending of at Least $115 Billion This Year
description: That would be a major jump from the $72 billion that the Silicon Valley tech giant shelled out last year, as it aims to compete in the artificial intelligence race.
content:
To stay competitive in the artificial intelligence race, Meta increased its spending on data centers last year and began shifting away from virtual reality.
On Wednesday, the company said it would bet even bigger this year.

title: Tesla invests $2 billion in Musk's xAI and reiterates Cybercab production starts this year
description: Tesla said on Wednesday it will invest $2 billion in CEO Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI - and that production plans for its Cybercab robotaxi and Semi trucks were on track for this...
content:
Jan 28 (Reuters) - Tesla said on Wednesday it will invest $2 billion in CEO Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI - and that production plans for its Cybercab robotaxi and Semi trucks were on track for this year.

title: ServiceNow (NOW) Gives Outlook That Fails to Ease AI Disruption Fears
description: ServiceNow Inc. gave a sales outlook in the current quarter that was stronger than expected, but failed to reduce investor anxieties that artificial intelligence will disrupt the software maker’s business.
content:
ServiceNow Strong Results Overshadowed by AI Disruption Fear

title: Google DeepMind employees request plans to keep them 'physically safe' from ICE: report
description: Employees at Google’s DeepMind artificial intelligence lab reportedly demanded that management detail plans on how to keep them “physically safe” from ICE after the fatal shooting of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis.
content:

title: IBM beats fourth-quarter revenue estimates as AI boosts software demand
description: IBM beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue and profit on Wednesday, as the rapid adoption of artificial intelligence boosts demand for its software services, ranging from managing swaths of data to automating IT processes.
content:
